sn37.12:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo …pe… nirayam upapajjati.
sn37.12:1.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappi ca hoti, kusito ca hoti, duppanno ca hoti—
sn37.12:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo …pe… apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
